projects.title: PLIT LEARN
projects.description: A full-stack educational website for Plit Learn using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and a Python backend to showcase courses and key info. Improved user engagement by 20% in 3 months and boosted seamless payments by 60% with a custom payment API.

projects.title: Backend Development
projects.description: Master server-side programming and database management. You'll learn server-side languages like Python, Node.js, database management with SQL and NoSQL, API development and integration, authentication and security practices.

projects.title: UI/UX Design
projects.description: In the UI/UX Design course, you will learn to design user interfaces that are both functional and aesthetically pleasing by understanding user-centered design principles, creating wireframes, prototypes to test usability, using design tools like Figma, FigJam, and Miro.

projects.title: Data Science
projects.description: Our Data Science course equips you with essential skills in data analysis and machine learning. Learn to collect, clean, and manipulate data using Python and SQL, and gain expertise in statistical analysis and data visualization.
